TEI.2.document_title: H. R. Spear to Stephen F Austin, 05-28-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Henry F. Spear to Austin, Dedham, May 28, 1834. Asks information about compensation for Mexican service in 1812. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1056
